trans-unit.source: Represents an element of an X.509 chain.
trans-unit.target: 表示 X.509 链的元素。

trans-unit.source: This object is constructed internally and is returned as part of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection> when calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.ChainElements%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此对象内部构造，并作为的一部分返回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainElementCollection>调用时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.ChainElements%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate at a particular chain element.
trans-unit.target: 在特定链元素处获取 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an X.509 certificate for this element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回此元素的 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于用户选择的证书。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error status of the current X.509 certificate in a chain.
trans-unit.target: 获取链中的当前 X.509 证书的错误状态。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatus> objects, each consisting of an error code bit and a descriptive localized error message.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的数组<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatus>对象，其中每个包括的错误代码位和描述性本地化的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets additional error information from an unmanaged certificate chain structure.
trans-unit.target: 从非托管证书链结构中获取其他错误信息。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the <see langword="pwszExtendedErrorInfo" /> member of the unmanaged <see langword="CERT_CHAIN_ELEMENT" /> structure in the Crypto API.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 Crypto API 中非托管 <see langword="pwszExtendedErrorInfo" /> 结构的 <see langword="CERT_CHAIN_ELEMENT" /> 成员。

trans-unit.source: This string is available only on computers with Windows XP Professional or later operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串是仅在通过 Windows XP 专业版或更高版本操作系统的计算机上可用。

trans-unit.source: An empty string ("") is returned if the operating system is not Windows XP Professional or later.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串 ("") 返回如果操作系统不是 Windows XP 专业版或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于用户选择的证书。
